definition: famous watch (i.e. expensive brand of wristwatch)
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: Nomination form should be completed in English.
sentences.chinese: 提名錶格須以英文填寫。

sentences.english: We buy & sell branded bags & watches.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎買賣二手名牌手袋和名錶。

sentences.english: Mr. Stevenson was mentioned in the annual report for his cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文生先生因樂於合作在年度報告中被提名錶揚。

sentences.english: The soldier was mentioned in dispatches.
sentences.chinese: 這名士兵在戰報中受到提名錶揚。

sentences.english: The witness is required to complete Part III of the form and sign thereunder .
sentences.chinese: 見證人必須填寫及簽署提名錶格第三部份。

sentences.english: Lanthimos reacted to the nomination by saying "this was very unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 蘭斯莫斯對本片的提名錶示“完全沒有預料到。

sentences.english: On his name said he also saw Qin Bing isnt interested in.
sentences.chinese: 亦名錶示自己對他看到秦冰並不感興趣。

sentences.english: Who will get the nomination for president?
sentences.chinese: 這名士兵在戰報中受到提名錶揚。

sentences.english: All entries should be legibly written or typewritten.
sentences.chinese: 所有提名錶格必須工整書寫或用打字機填寫。

sentences.english: Today's US athlete is thus content to be an entertainer.
sentences.chinese: 今天的美國運動員是如此滿足於當一名錶演藝人。

sentences.english: A quarterly trade title features full color, large-format illustrations of brand name watches gleaned from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 名錶時尚季刊，薈萃環球知名流行品牌，爲市場導覽。

sentences.english: Today, a number of advanced collectives and individuals who have been named.
sentences.chinese: 一批先進集體和個人今天受到了命名錶彰。

sentences.english: Nominators may make as many copies of the Nomination Form as they wish for convenient use.
sentences.chinese: 提名人可自行復印本提名錶格備用。

definition: to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/just a handful/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
